Experimentally, Phase III is associated with a sharp drop in the vibron frequency and the appearance of a strong IR signal. This implies a non-centrosymmetric structure and a weakening of the molecules. In studies of HD a process of bond dissociation and recombination (“ DISREC”, 2HD → H 2 + D 2) has been observed
50 . This bond breaking is seen in DFT to also occur in pure H 2
26, 30 . Our potential does not allow for bond breaking, so we have not studied the dynamics of this “Phase III” in detail.
